com.google.googlejavaformat.java

类 JavaInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.googlejavaformat.InputOutput
      • com.google.googlejavaformat.Input
        • com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInput

  • public final class JavaInput
extends Input
    JavaInput extends Input to represent a Java input document.

      • getPositionTokenMap

        public ImmutableRangeMap<Integer,com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaInput.Token> getPositionTokenMap()
        Get the navigable map from position to Token. Used to look for tokens following a given one, and to implement the --offset and --length flags to reformat a character range in the input file.
        指定者:
        getPositionTokenMap 在类中 Input
